description: A unified agent that provides both social media and news information for Bangalore. Handles social media posts, trending topics, news articles with integrated breaking news, and area-specific updates. Excludes traffic, weather, and environmental news as those are handled by specialized agents.
name: social_news_agent

skills.name: Social Media Trending Topics
skills.description: Retrieve current trending topics on social media in Bangalore

skills.name: Social Media Posts
skills.description: Get recent social media posts about Bangalore

skills.name: News Articles with Breaking News
skills.description: Retrieve current news articles for Bangalore including integrated breaking news from various categories

skills.name: Area-specific News
skills.description: Get news specific to areas in Bangalore like Koramangala, Indiranagar, etc.
